name: What planet do I choose?
description:
A GAME MADE FOR THE "QUARANTINE GAME JAM"!

The theme was "A lot of" so, for my game is, A LOT OF PLANETS!

Lore:

The earth is invaded by viruses, mankind need to find a new place to live that is 100 planets away from earth! Can you save humanity?

Controls:

  • Arrows:  Movement
